Html:
I'm using the webbrowser control to display BingMaps (due startup delays experienced with the WPF BingMaps control). I've a page with only a single full size webbrowser control.

The page transition effect does not work fine.

Entering the page there is no animation: the content jump from the start position to the final position.
Leaving the page I can see the new content coming in from the left side, but it goes below the webbrowser.

Is it possibile to disable the navigation transition for a single page?
